titleStmt.title: Die Veneris, 24 Augusti, 1649. A declaration of the Commons assembled in Parliament, declaring all persons who have served the Parliament of England in Ireland, and have betrayed their trust, or have or shall adhere to, or ayd and assist Charls Stuart, son to the late King, to be traytors & rebels.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

titleStmt.title: Die Veneris, 24 Augusti, 1649. A declaration of the Commons assembled in Parliament, declaring all persons who have served the Parliament of England in Ireland, and have betrayed their trust, or have or shall adhere to, or ayd and assist Charls Stuart, son to the late King, to be traytors & rebels.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Husband, Printer to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: Order to print signed: Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
